name: RTM - The Last Days
description:
In this harrowing adventure, you awaken in the heart of a mysterious, ever-changing forest with no memory of how you arrived. As the sun sets, an eerie transformation takes place, turning the once tranquil woods into a realm of darkness and dread.



Survive and Thrive: You must scavenge for supplies, weapons, and tools to stay alive. Craft makeshift weapons and build shelters to withstand the relentless terror that haunts the night. Your choices will determine whether you live to see another dawn.

Unearth Your Past: As you explore deeper into the forest, you'll uncover cryptic clues and hidden secrets that hint at the truth of your predicament. Unravel the dark history of the forest, your connection to it, and the malevolent forces that hold you captive.

Realistic Survival Mechanics: Manage your hunger, thirst, and exhaustion to maintain your strength. Keep your sanity in check, as prolonged exposure to the horrors of the forest may lead to madness.

Multiple Endings: Your choices will have a profound impact on the story, leading to multiple possible endings. Will you find a way to escape the forest's sinister grasp, or will you succumb to the darkness?

Infinite World: We presents a dynamically generated open world that stretches endlessly in every direction. There are no boundaries to your exploration, and no two playthroughs are the same. The forest seems to shift and evolve with each passing night, offering a unique and unpredictable experience every time.
